title: bilalaydemir
author: bilalaydemir
created_time: December 15, 2022, 12:04:27 PMLast edit: December 15, 2022, 01:23:08 PM by bilalaydemir
content: Hello.I deposited $1435 on Sportsbet.I won and two withdrawals of $3000 and $3240 were successful.I kept betting and won $8060.And I went through the security measures as they have done to many people recently and it was successful.Then came the multi-account email. You started making the same accusations to everyone.The problem here seems to be that monetized accounts are banned completely.My account was closed before my $8060 balance in my account was paid.I hope my problem is solved. I still want to trust Sportsbet.Balance Informationhttps://i.hizliresim.com/2izabtk.jpegEmail informationhttps://i.hizliresim.com/rg8qcwn.jpghttps://i.hizliresim.com/7mqmgmy.jpghttps://i.hizliresim.com/the4360.jpgAccount activitieshttps://i.hizliresim.com/36c1811.jpg

comments.author: janggernaut
comments.body: It seems you and this guy (i don't believe he is saying he is a girl) which recently complained as well about their winnings https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5428296.0 are same person. You guys use that strange site to upload your image (i.hizliresim) i have never seen someone use that site except both of you (but i need stronger proof beside of that).In other hand, sportsbet.io has provided us the proof if that guy used multiple accounts, which broke their rules. He can still withdraw his deposit, his winnings got blocked. how about you?

comments.author: bilalaydemir
comments.created_time: December 15, 2022, 01:20:03 PMLast edit: December 15, 2022, 01:32:16 PM by bilalaydemir

He can still withdraw his deposit, his winnings got blocked. how about you?what are you accusing me of? Are you contacting me because that friend was a victim and I commented on him? I'm new to the forum and in my internet search, hizliimage came up first in the image upload search from Turkey and I used it. Instead of criticizing me, think about it, is it a coincidence that this site has recently increased complaints.He used https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5427453.0 hizliresim.com in this account. Is this person me?

comments.author: albon
comments.body: As for me, I have never bet on Sportsbet nor used it before, but today I found many topics in the scam section about this site and I do not know what is happening. In fact, Sportsbet has many terms and conditions, and it was better for you to read them carefully before depositing your money and betting on their site because if you violate one of these conditions, or if you do not violate and they discover something in your account or in the source of the money that you deposited, it came from illegal methods such as money laundering or illegal activities and the like, so your account will violate their terms and conditions, and therefore they have the right to terminate or suspend the account and confiscate all the money as they mentioned to you. I hope that the Sportsbet team will solve your problem and clarify the issue, and I hope that you will provide us with more proof that you have not violated their rules.

comments.author: bilalaydemir
comments.body: Quote from: albon on December 15, 2022, 02:29:03 PMAs for me, I have never bet on Sportsbet nor used it before, but today I found many topics in the scam section about this site and I do not know what is happening. In fact, Sportsbet has many terms and conditions, and it was better for you to read them carefully before depositing your money and betting on their site because if you violate one of these conditions, or if you do not violate and they discover something in your account or in the source of the money that you deposited, it came from illegal methods such as money laundering or illegal activities and the like, so your account will violate their terms and conditions, and therefore they have the right to terminate or suspend the account and confiscate all the money as they mentioned to you. I hope that the Sportsbet team will solve your problem and clarify the issue, and I hope that you will provide us with more proof that you have not violated their rules.I earned a total of $16,000 two days in a row.I took the shot, it was paid twice.On the second day there is gain again. This time the review.First time no problem, second time why is there a problem?I think it's just something that happens to accounts that make a lot of profits.Will everyone using VPN count as multiple accounts?

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Quote from: bilalaydemir on December 15, 2022, 02:46:53 PMFirst time no problem, second time why is there a problem?At every interval of the ban, there must be a problematic user. You'll still make complaints even if your account is closed immediately after registering. I don't know how sportsbet closes your account, but 2 days apart of closing I think is pretty standard time to manually investigate suspicious accounts.Many casinos end up limiting VPN use due to abuse including multiple accounts.Btw, does that mean youused VPN?

comments.author: 8rch7
comments.body: Little funny with your Sportsbet closed and loss $8060, I am laughing with the Sportsbet team said you are multiple account created based on unique and almost the same name with another linked account. I sure every one can create our account name with similar and seems not enough reason with your account close as multiple account after unique name linked with another account. However you have success made twice withdrawal from $3000 and $3240, seems they are not happy with your lucky after won more than $6,000 success withdrawing and last chance more than $8060 they will try with habit reason all casino gambling about multiple account created.

I don't know how sportsbet closes your account, but 2 days apart of closing I think is pretty standard time to manually investigate suspicious accounts.Many casinos end up limiting VPN use due to abuse including multiple accounts.Btw, does that mean youused VPN?In order to enter some sites in Turkey, vpn is a must, so I have to use it too. It's hard for me to turn it off and on every time.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: bilalaydemir on December 15, 2022, 05:15:52 PMQuote from: rat03gopoh on December 15, 2022, 04:56:50 PMQuote from: bilalaydemir on December 15, 2022, 02:46:53 PMFirst time no problem, second time why is there a problem?At every interval of the ban, there must be a problematic user. You'll still make complaints even if your account is closed immediately after registering. I don't know how sportsbet closes your account, but 2 days apart of closing I think is pretty standard time to manually investigate suspicious accounts.Many casinos end up limiting VPN use due to abuse including multiple accounts.Btw, does that mean youused VPN?In order to enter some sites in Turkey, vpn is a must, so I have to use it too. It's hard for me to turn it off and on every time.this is why reading the casino's ToS is a must, it can save you a lot of trouble and money. if you check their ToS 2.16.(quoted below) you'll see that they prohibit the use of "geo-location and IP masking". also, regarding the "will VPN count as multi-accounts?", from what I have seen, yes, VPN users usually share an IP address. 've seen a lot of people who got banned for multi-accounting because they use VPN.Quote2.16.    You accept and acknowledge that we reserve the right to detect and prevent the use of prohibited techniques, including but not limited to fraudulent transaction detection, automated registration and signup, gameplay and screen capture techniques. These steps may include, but are not limited to, examination of Players device properties, detection of geo-location and IP masking, transactions and blockchain analysis;

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Quote from: bilalaydemir on December 15, 2022, 05:15:52 PMIn order to enter some sites in Turkey, vpn is a must, so I have to use it too. It's hard for me to turn it off and on every time.Well, getting more and more bright spots, that's an indication of the violation I mean.It's not surprising why you actually used the url sportsbet244, at first I thought you were accessing the wrong site.I also wanna say that free VPN services generally generate dynamic IPs.
